message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $12,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am proposing a special introductory price of $14,000 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this remarkable item at a discounted rate.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm only comfortable spending up to $12,000 for this product.  I'm very interested in it, but that's my absolute limit.
